title: Elfam Merks Shirt Designs
paragraph: Co-owned Merchandise/Design team. Our first collection for a fund-raising project of an Australia-based Scholarship Organization.
note: We have raised 20,000PHP on first batch of our designs

cards.title: Established for a reason
cards.paragraph: Two years ago, I've built a design team that create designs for an exchange of good relationship and purpose.

cards.title: Merks Berks
cards.paragraph: We're only consists of 6 people, and they're all friends of mine since college. But i'm the only artist doing design and leading the company.

cards.title: Project Tee
cards.paragraph: Our first project was co-sponsored by SSVP, an Australia-based Foundation that provides scholdarships. Though we've start on very small investments, we're able to duplicate our sales and raised money for a fund-rasing purpose.
cards.footnote: I used Blender and Photoshop to create these graphics

cards.title: The Designs
cards.paragraph: For whole collaborated project, I have created 7 tees mostly typography designs.

cards.title: What's Next?
cards.paragraph: Currently, the team was lay low due to other commitments. But maybe one day we'll start working together again, or maybe not. :)
